answers.answer: Go to your MD just to let them know but it's ok to have morning sickness as long as you have your vitamin liek the other poster said, take it at night. A lot of people have so much morning sickness that they lose weight, and it's still ok, as long as it doesn't keep happening. After about 10-12 weeks it should go away and then you should be fine and thats when it is a definite to start gaining weight, but at the beginning its ok. Call your MD and let them know you started it though just incase they want to put it in your chart. Good luck!

I feel your pain!  With my first I was so sick.  I actually got dehydrated and ended up in the hospital.  So, your job is to make sue you are getting enough fluids.  Also, ask your doctor about a prenatal vitamin with NO iron.  Alot of pregnant women become anemic, I on the other hand, had to much iron and it was the cause for the sickness.  Talk to your doc and see what he can prescribe.  As long as you are not throwing up profusley, you should be ok and hopefully it will end soon.  Good luck and (((((hugs)))).
